lead_paragraph: A blowout at a natural gas well that gushed uncontrollably for 16 weeks and drove thousands of residents from their Los Angeles homes was plugged Thursday.

headline.print_headline: California: Gas Utility Plugs Well Leaking Since October
headline.main: California: Gas Utility Plugs Well Leaking Since October

snippet: A blowout at a natural gas well that gushed uncontrollably for 16 weeks and drove thousands of residents from their Los Angeles homes was plugged Thursday.
abstract: Southern California Gas Co announces blowout at natural gas well in Los Angeles has been plugged; leak had forced thousands from their homes for 16 weeks.
